Churchtown Primary School Fundraiser

Help us improve our school facilities for all children

{formatCurrency(raised)}

raised of {formatCurrency(goal)} goal

{donors} donors have contributed

Make a Donation

Your contribution will make a difference to our school community.

About Our Fundraiser

We're raising funds to improve the playground facilities at Churchtown Primary School. Our goal is to create a safe, engaging outdoor space where children can play and learn. The new playground will include accessible equipment for children of all abilities.

Every donation, no matter how small, brings us closer to our goal. Thank you for supporting our school community!

Contact Us

Have questions about our fundraiser? Get in touch with us:

Or email us at: fundraising@churchtownprimary.example
